original_text: Then in accordance with what is written, they celebrated the Festival of Tabernacles with the required number of burnt offerings prescribed for each day.
korean_text: 기록된 규례대로 초막절을 지켜 번제를 매일 정수대로 날마다 드리고

sentences.original_text: Then in accordance with what is written
they celebrated the Festival of Tabernacles
with the required number of burnt offerings
